import axios from"axios";import{SORT_DATA,GET_CLICKED_PRODUCT_REQ,GET_CLICKED_PRODUCT_SUCCESS,GET_PRODUCT_FAILURE,GET_PRODUCT_REQ,GET_PRODUCT_SUCCESS}from"./actionTypes";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";// action for get products request
export var getProductsReq=function getProductsReq(){return{type:GET_PRODUCT_REQ};};// action for get products success
export var getProductsSuccess=function getProductsSuccess(payload){return{type:GET_PRODUCT_SUCCESS,payload:payload};};// action for get products failure
export var getProductsFailure=function getProductsFailure(){return{type:GET_PRODUCT_FAILURE};};// thunk call to fetch products  list
export var getproductsData=function getproductsData(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(getProductsReq());axios.get("https://movie-fake-server.herokuapp.com/products").then(function(res){dispatch(getProductsSuccess(res.data));}).catch(function(){dispatch(getProductsFailure());});};};// action object for sort  feature
export var sortProducts=function sortProducts(payload){return{type:SORT_DATA,payload:payload};};export var getClickedProductRequest=function getClickedProductRequest(){return{type:GET_CLICKED_PRODUCT_REQ};};export var getClickedProductSuccess=function getClickedProductSuccess(payload){// console.log(payload.data);
return{type:GET_CLICKED_PRODUCT_SUCCESS,payload:payload};};export var getClickedProductFailure=function getClickedProductFailure(){return{type:GET_PRODUCT_FAILURE};};export var getClickedProductData=function getClickedProductData(id){return function(dispatch){dispatch(getClickedProductRequest());axios.get("https://movie-fake-server.herokuapp.com/products/".concat(id)).then(function(res){dispatch(getClickedProductSuccess(res.data));}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);dispatch(getClickedProductFailure());});};};
